data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus sylvestris (Scotch pine) from sample DAI-162

Exposition SW, Slope 25 deg, Geology: Anstehender Kalk, av. Tree height 13 m, Tree cover 55%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 1%, Vegatation type: Hom. flachgr. Fö-Standort. Steil+Windexpon. , Film number: 581A
